summary: Add ability ta change MyLocationNewOverlay icons

comments.content:
Is the any way to change MyLocationNewOverlay icons (person and arrow)? It will be good to add this ability maybe by public methods, etc.
Thanks!

Take a look at the ResourceProxy. It allows you to specify your own resources such as strings, and bitmaps. For the location overlay see ResourceProxy.bitmap.person and ResourceProxy.bitmap.direction_arrow.
